title: Is it okay to..
body:
Hi i followed some steps to make my game work again. (Fix Bugsplat after champion select) 

I wanted to know if  it was okay to follow the steps when we change the Logitech stuff and add an F at the end or will it get me banned for playing with the game files ?

Link the the steps: http://www.alvintube.xyz/video/how-fix-rads-error-black-screen-bug-crash-aft/g7NK6UbG0m0
Time stamp: 2:12

Thank you for answering.

replies.body: I'm not really sure what this video is trying to do, but I'd recommend using our official guides and articles before other sources.  If you want to let me know what issue you're experiencing exactly I'd be happy to lend a hand.  Let me know with any details and specifics!
Everytime champion select would be done and the game would be about to start i would bug splat. {{item:3151}}

Thanks for the info!  If your crashes are specifically happening while trying to load then you may actually be having game file and driver issues that's failing to render the game.  The steps in the video guide are not close to resolving that problem.  Instead, go over each step of the [game crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes+) guide.  You should also download the [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to help with some of the steps.  Let me know how that works out for you!

I fixed it... it was a really dumb error. I had to change the screen resolution in the config file..
Thank you.
